solution-name.description: The name of the solution to which the microservice belongs. (example: homelink)

service-name.description: The name of the microservice. (example: monitoring)

github-account.description: The name of the GitHub account containing the repository to restore the shared solution NuGets.

aks-group.description: The Azure resource group containing the AKS. (example: kube-cluster)

aks-name.description: The name of the AKS cluster to deploy microservice. (example: aksmscluster)

registry.description: The registry where the microservice image is stored. (example: aksmsclusteracr.azurecr.io)

chart-version.description: The version of the Microservice Helm Chart used to deploy. (example: 1.0.0)

port.description: The port used when running the service. (example: 7200)

host.description: The host from which the microservice can be accessed. (example:  homelink.com)
